resources.string:
This sample app illustrates how to use the Vuforia Digital Eyewear feature. The app detects certain images and augments a 3D teapot on top of them.

To use this app:
1. Print the image targets located at developer.vuforia.com/resources/samples/files

2. Point your device at any of the images

3. See the teapot augmented on top of the image
